item.title: A Shark’s Tale ends in FiveSixEight
item.author: Kate Turner,
item.description: Recently I went for lunch at FiveSixEight in Beit Quad and was very surprised to find oven-baked Blue Shark Fillet available on the menu at a very affordable £5.50. I wanted to double check if it really was shark fillet, so I e-mailed the commercial services manager, who confirmed that yes indeed …
